title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 March 2017 - XWiki
content:
<OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
01:04 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
02:40 <sdumitriu> has quit  
02:56 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
03:54 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
06:31 <Aranjedeath> has quit  
06:32 <Aranjedeath> has joined #xwiki  
06:44 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
06:48 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
07:16 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:08 <mflorea> has quit  
08:15 <Aranjedeath> has quit  
08:45 <pulkit4tech> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <martinus\_\_> Hi all, you xwiki people aware that snippets.xwiki.org is tls-enabled ?  
10:09 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
10:22 <floflobel> has joined #xwiki  
10:23 <free4murad[m]> has quit  
10:23 <free4murad[m]> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:38 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:50 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:09 <mflorea> has quit  
12:43 <msmeria2> has joined #xwiki  
12:45 <msmeria> has quit  
13:05 <vmassol> tmortagne, mflorea1, Enygma, and all: now is the time to reply to Mohamed's proposal to work on the next version of the blog app. He's already started so please reply ASAP since he'd like to progress fast. Thx  
13:27 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
13:28 <vmassol> BTW on a different topic  
13:28 <vmassol> we need to upgrade both Selenium to latest  
13:28 <vmassol> and upgrade the version of FF we have on the agents since I believe we're not testing with latest as we should  
13:28 <vmassol> as indicated at n  
13:28 <vmassol> http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/BrowserSupportStrategy  
14:53 <tmortagne1> vmassol: we are definitely not tested with last version of FF  
14:53 <tmortagne1> far from it even  
14:53 <tmortagne1> firefox-32.0.1  
14:53 <tmortagne1> s/tested/testing/  
14:53 <msmeria2> has quit  
15:33 <vmassol> tmortagne: yes, we'll need to do something about it. If I can find the time next week, I'll work on it.  
15:34 <vmassol> but if someone else wants to do it, I'm fine to leave it as I don't especially want it :)  
15:37 <tmortagne1> vmassol: me neither, I don't know Selenium very well  
15:38 <vmassol> yeah I know it a bit more probably  
15:38 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
15:42 <tmortagne1> vmassol: note that I saw a script to upgrade FF on agents, I thing mflorea1 wrote it  
15:43 <tmortagne1> install-firefox.sh on maven.xwiki.org (no idea if it works, just saw it)  
15:53 <tmortagne1> s/thing/think/  
16:07 <vmassol> tmortagne: ok thanks, I didn't know about it  
16:07 <tmortagne1> but that's not the hard part, the hard part is if some test start failing  
16:55 <acotiuga> has quit
